item.title: The Privilege of Prayer
item.description:
The Privilege of Prayer by Elder J. Devn Cornish, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 181st Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 2011
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder J. Devn Cornish, Of the Seventy

item.title: Am I Good Enough? Will I Make It?
item.description:
Am I Good Enough? Will I Make It? by Elder J. Devn Cornish, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 186th Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 2016
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
